website_summaries.verdict: A popular and luxurious option, this soft, calming blanket comes in stylish colors that aren't commonly found in weighted blankets.
pros: Available in neutral gray, blue, green, and pink, colors that pair nicely with different room décor
Owners say it helps reduce stress and promotes more restful sleep
cons: Available in fewer sizes than some other adult-size weighted blankets

customer_reviews.title: Truly a Stress Reliever!
customer_reviews.text: I can't express how much I LOVE this blanket! I have to admit I was a little skeptical about a weighted blanket being a stress reliever, but when I covered up with this blanket after a VERY stressful day at work I immediately began to relax. The fabric is soft and the blanket is great quality. The color - I purchased gray - is beautiful! The only negative I have about this blanket is that now my husband, son, and I fight over it! I think I will have to buy a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Budisavljevic

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Update: I have to say that the customer service for this company is amazing. After recieving a new blanket I am gladly updating this review. The new blanket is exactly what i wanted it to be. I've had this blanket 2 days and the stitching is coming out. For the price you pay for it I expected much better. I doubt it will last me a year with the way its already coming undone. I had such high hopes for this blanket too. Pretty upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: A quality made blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is high quality and well made but a little too heavy for me. I gave it five stars because the weight was not their issue, it was mine. The minute I lifted this blanket I knew it was way too heavy for me to sleep under. I need more like 12 pounds, but that doesn't diminish the quality of this blanket. Will order from them in a smaller weight.
customer_reviews.author: DianeM

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket ever? Yup!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is incredible. It is so soft and the weight is evenly distributed. It most definitely gives you a calming feeling. The quality is top notch. It could easily serve as a comforter too. Overall, this blanket is a must buy in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brossi Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Quality weighted blanket
customer_reviews.text: Love the weighted blanket. Definitely sleeping better. Important to know: the blanket fits like a pad. It lays on the top of the mattress with zero overhang. I bought the queen size for a queen size bed. I wish there was overhang on each side but even so, I love this blanket and it is giving me a better nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Leaks the filling!  Lost all weight in the center
customer_reviews.text: We loved this when we got it, but the filling LEAKS out. There are fine little bead things throughout my daughter's bed. There's no weight to the fill in the middle--it has worked its way around the baffles and slumps in the edges. It's much cuter than the other weighted blanket we have, because the fabric is nice, but it's been less than a year and it's a fail.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I was being sufficated
customer_reviews.text: I like to be under the covers with weight on me, but this was ridiculous! Didn't buy the heavy one either. It was like a lead blanket you'd have on at the doctor's office for an X-ray. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Faulty threading
customer_reviews.text: It was really and nice, but after the first night using it I noticed that it was leaking glass beads and some of the threading had been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised, nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: The weighted blanket was as described and appears to be excellent quality. Arrived well packaged and is going to be an excellent Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: David Pyne

customer_reviews.title: leaking beads
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to receive this as a gift but after one night he noticed little beads all over his bead. Now we can't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: friend

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think a weighted blanket could help me sleep better, but I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit taken aback when I first took this blanket out of the delivery box - it was much heavier (folded) than I had expected. But the minute I spread it across my bed and crawled under it, I felt the wonderful comfort! If you have any issues like anxiety, insomnia, restless legs, or just an inability to switch your brain to the "Off" setting at night, you might also really enjoy the sensation of a cool, even, satiny weight enclosing your body as you lie down to sleep. I love this blanket and can't believe I ever slept before I got it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marion Capriotti

customer_reviews.title: Most Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted to try a weighted blanket for years. A big box store had a sale on one and I tried it and it improved my sleep greatly, only it was an "inexpensive" one. So researched and selected this one in the 20 lb queen. It just arrived and seems perfect. Slept under it last night for deeper sleep...so comforting. I am curious about the tiny loops around the outside edge - what they are for. Must be something good. Couldn't find anything about them on the specs. Any how. Good deal, good value, and it WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Ron M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this at all, to heavy for one, for my weight it said for me to get a 15lb wt blanket. Made me more anxious
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this weighted blanket!!! Would most definitely buy again. Was quite a bit heavier than I realized, but so glad it is!
customer_reviews.author: John Ream

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Beneficial and priced right - love it!
customer_reviews.text: After researching the benefits of a weighted blanket, I shopped around a lot to find a one that worked for quality, comfort and my budget. My Simple Being blanket is all that. It came in such lovely colors, it was hard to choose, but I went with tranquil green. It's beautiful and is well made, and well balanced. I've had sleep issues forever. While they did not go from waking 30 times to sleeping through the night, I have found a drastic improvement in the short time I've had the blanket. I'm hoping that over time I will achieve perfect sleep. It's cooling too so I won't have to give it up in the summer months. Very, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Doris T.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I wanted so badly to love this blanket. I have heard such great things about weighted blankets. Well, unfortunately, it made me feel clausterphobic and hot. My sleep did not improve at all and I tried it for 4 nights in a row without ever "getting used to it." I gave it 2 stars for "giftable" only because it is so heavy. I wouldn't attempt to send this through the mail or you would pay a fortune because of it's weight. But, if you are hand-delivering, that might work. Wish I loved it but I just didn't. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tani

customer_reviews.title: Best yet! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had many weighted blankets but this one by far has been my favorite. It is very durable and it has held together. It goes with me everywhere. And they make great gifts. Great quality, you get what you pay for with these weighted blanket. You will not be disappointed. Extremely soft material as well. No shifting with the weighted beads inside either. Not one complaint about this blanket. I don’t do you suggest getting a cover for it because most dry cleaners don’t want to mess with these blankets. Or they will charge you an arm and a leg, $60 here in West Texas, to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad&Casey

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!  Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this now! Don’t hesitate to choose this weighted blanket because I know what it’s like to start looking and have no idea which one is going to be the “right” one. This is it! I’ve already ordered another one for my son! This size is right for couch lounging! Makes me feel so secure and relaxed!
customer_reviews.author: gamecock 1995

customer_reviews.title: 12 lbs is a good weight
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged a different weighted blanket for this one and I like this one a lot better. 12 lbs in a 48x72"-ish is good for one adult. I'm a very active sleeper and this seems to keep me more in one place so I'm sleeping better. The pockets are a good size to distribute the glass beads evenly. It is warm, but the other one I tried was too hot so I think the extra heat trapping comes with all weighted blankets. The ties for the duvet cover are very sturdy, moreso than the duvet cover I bought itself, so they'll hold it on. All in all I like it.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: After years of restless legs, muscle cramps, and various insomnia issues, I joined the ranks of weighted blanket users. My criteria were small quilt squares, fine small stitching of same, and a "reasonable" price. We have a king bed, but this was only for me (HE sleeps like a bear in winter throughout all seasons!) and it more than covers my half. It does require a bit of creativity now to make a rather sleek top of the made bed, but it works. And the weighted blanket works for me. I weigh about 120-125# at 5'1" and purchased the 12# blanket. Each to her own, but this is a game changer for me!
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Humleker

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Feels ok to touch. but good weight.
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is nicely weighted. I don’t love the way it feels to the touch overall it’s nice. I received one that was more of the Amazon Warehouse seller fault - mine came unwrapped and just thrown in a box. I bought mine “like new” and it was described as coming in original packaging but damaged packaging - not true. I know the new ones are at least packaged nicer. I couldn’t leave a seller review of amazon warehouse so I’m leaving one inside this one
customer_reviews.author: 41reviews

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: Did some research before buying a weighted blanket because my sleep was really crappy. After doing a bit of research I settled at this. For a blanket, yes it's kind of pricey, but my god is it comfortable. I've been using it for a couple of months now and my sleep has been great since, although that's a combination of making my bed more comfortable as well as getting into better sleeping habits. But all-in-all, this blanket feels like a giant hug whenever it's on you, and surprisingly, as a person who gets hot quick, this blanket stayed pretty dang cool during the night. Great blanket.
customer_reviews.author: faisal mansur

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color Sent
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice blanket but my daughter was sent the wrong color. She is on a college campus and the box was heavy. After carrying the box back to her room, which by the way is a good distance from the mailroom, she opened the box and on the front of the package it said color: gray. It was in plain sight so it was pure carelessness that they sent out this blanket. She had ordered a green one. The two colors aren't even close and now she has to tote it back to the mailroom to return it. For this reason I give two stars. Please check orders more carefully before sending out to customers. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product over similar blankets because of the stitching and smaller pocket design to hold the beads in place. It is really very well made and no shifting or rattling of beads. Some of the other blankets I liked didn’t offer the 12 lb or at least not in stock. I max out on weight at 120 lbs. so the 12 pound was the recommendation and it’s perfect. I live in Florida so I’m more concerned with coolness than warmth. The blanket provides weigh without heat.
customer_reviews.author: GoodDog

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully relaxing!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this weighted blanket for my grown daughter who has always had some level of sleep difficulty. SHE LOVES IT! She says it makes her feel so snug and secure that she doesn't move around so much in her sleep - so doesn't wake up with kinks and muscle cramps. Also, it's a soothing, relaxing sensation that promotes sound sleep. Totally recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley, Joyful Collaborator

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a college student, and because of the stress of school, a part-time job, and the constant anxiety of not having enough money, it's been really hard to fall asleep. I was skeptical about buying a weighted blanket, but after months of restless sleep, I decided to take the plunge. This blanket is not only comfortable, it puts me to sleep immediately and makes me feel incredibly relaxed. I love the feel of the fabric, and the weight is perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with insomnia. A friend posted online they too were suffering from insomnia and asking for suggestions. The overwhelming feedback in her post was to get a weight blanket. So I purchased one. I hated it. Not only was it way too hot, but it made it hard to breath, which just increased anxiety which made it even harder to sleep. I found nothing relaxing about it. I returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Makes a mess of tiny glass beads on your bed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this blanket... Until I noticed how weirdly uncomfortable my bed was becoming. First I thought I'd gotten slobby, and spilled food crumbs all over my bed. But then I realized there was no way that was possible, I'd wash my sheets and within minutes my bed was a mess of uncomfortable little... Something's. This blanket spills the glass beads all over your bed, and at this point I'm done with it. I'd love to love this blanket, as it did genuinely help me sleep, but I hate how my bed is now covered in these beads.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Burger

customer_reviews.title: Very good and best price
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the diamond design of the pockets and the blanket feels good quality and very durable. I was pleasantly surprised when I opened it. My daughter suffers from anxiety which increases at bedtime and I am excited to finally have one of these to help her. The price is amazing! I bought it based on price and reviews and I'm glad I did. I recommend this seller and this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 135 and the 15 lb felt too heavy so I gave it to my mom but it is an amazing quality blanket you definitely have to buy a cover for it though. I switch to a brand that sold 12 lb blanket. It gives you like security like you're being cradled or something.
customer_reviews.author: bawstongirl

customer_reviews.title: This Weighted Blanket Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the original green blanket, and now I find it, too, leaks the tiny little beads! The pink one did not leak (so far), but something is wrong with the green ones. ???? Otherwise, I like a weighted blanket and the 15# one is just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Find something else
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even have it for 2 weeks and the stitching was coming loose. You could literally just lightly tug at the seams and they'll break off. Do not spend 70 bucks on this. Find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and comforting!
customer_reviews.text: I really like sleeping under my weighted blanket, especially in winter. I don’t want to get out from under it! I would have given it all 5 stars except I sleep very hot. I keep my room under 65° and like to have feet and face cool. In the hotter weather, I found it warm. But I am very sensitive that way. The fabric is excellent for bedding. My pets sleep with me and the fur does not stick like with microfiber.
customer_reviews.author: P. B. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Closest thing to a straitjacket
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I felt like we were kidnapped by our bed. We both toss and turn when we sleep and this blanket does not help in the least. You feel like you are being held captive when you try and move. We tried it for over a week and by the next morning it was on the floor. I order the correct weighted blanket according to their sizing chart as well. No thanks, we will stick to out down comforter.
customer_reviews.author: N. Modonas

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for Christmas...I use it just as much as he does. Perfect for 110 pound person he wants it all the time (hes adhd and has some anxiety) . I will probably buy myself a heavier one (im 140 pounds)
customer_reviews.author: Rayanne Crane

customer_reviews.title: pretty and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a12 lbs one and wanted a blanket heavy than 10% of my weight. For whatever reason, I don't feel heavy. I had a 15 lbs before, I should order 15lb. I suggest people ordering a 12-15% of your weight, not 10%. Otherwise, the brand is pretty in color and very good quality. I highly recommend this maker.
customer_reviews.author: 2Grapes

customer_reviews.title: We love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the blue, 12 lb. 60 X 80 weighted blanket from Simple Being. It is wonderful...not too warm even though we live in Florida. The blanket doesn't shift around at night and works fine in the middle of a king size bed. I also appreciate the fact that it is made of hypoallergenic materials since I have a lot of allergies. The 12 lb. weight worked great for us and helps us get better sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is exceptionally good quality & has made a vast improvement in my sleep. The glass beads are evenly distributed and provide a feeling of comfort without feeling heavy. As soon as I get in bed, the blanket's weight works to help me relax and fall asleep. I feel more rested in the morning. I just love it and would recommend it enthusiastically.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blanket! The weight is just right and i have been sleeping better. I am super impressed with how it has the "cooling beads". I have terrible hot flashes and was worried the blanket would be too hot. I highly recommend this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Banes

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing & Comforting
customer_reviews.text: I love that this blanket brings me comfort and tranquillity as soon as I am under this weighted blanket. It's relaxing or going to bed. My only con: I did however notice a spot or two of stitching is a little unraveled but I am keeping an eye on them. I did tighten them myself and hoping that did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany.C

customer_reviews.title: 12 lbs is a good weight!
customer_reviews.text: The weight of the blanket is perfect. I originally bought a 25lb one because of how to encourage you to estimate the blanket by your body weight and it was wayyyy to heavy!!! So I decided to get a 12lb just for the weight and it is just right! So happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: It helps my PTSD symptoms
customer_reviews.text: I love my this blanket!! I suffer from PTSD, insomnia and an anxiety disorder, so I bought the 15lb one. It helps me with my issues. Only negative is that I can't use it year round due to it keeping me too warm. I might buy the 5lb one to see if that is cooler for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Blanket
customer_reviews.text: The reason I only gave it 2 stars was, I ordered and paid for a 15 lb Blanket. what I received weight only 12 lbs. This is actually my second purchase from this company. Other then that it is top quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zesty 101

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this blanket
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this blanket! It is exactly what I hoped it would be. I don't sleep good anymore since having kids and this blanket feels like a hug. Also it is not hot. We have a sheet and a comforter on our bed and I put this blanket on top. I never got hot. It is made very well. It also has 6 loops for a duvet cover. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cooleytwin89

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended that I try a weighted blanket since i am a horrible sleeper. It has helped and i love the way it settles around you. Perfect for the cold nights too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another good investment
customer_reviews.text: For my husband cooling blanket he said he likes it feels good to move a body part and find a cool place but he says really holds heat not to hav on your bed in the summer but this winter will be just fine he also had issue with waking up mid morning and when he used the blanket he slept threw the nite
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anna Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Needs better stitching
customer_reviews.text: Having had this blanket for a couple of months now, the weight of the blanket is great and I sleep pretty well with it. I'm honestly disappointed about the stitching though. From the beginning it did not look as good a quality as you would expect for the price. There are loose strands everywhere(thankfully none of the beading has moved though). The material of the blanket is very soft and has held up well against 5 cats and a dog. While i love my blanket and the color of it (seafoam) I'm not sure I would recommend this to anyone because of the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BLANKET! So much I got 2 of them! I sleep with one and I can tell a huge difference when I don’t have it. I don’t know what it is but I feel like I sleep so much better with it. It’s not so heavy I can’t move, but provides a perfect hug like feeling. Highly recommend! The stitching is lasting well so far and I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: end702

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my weighted blanket! It helps with my fibromyalgia, and helps with my sleep. It's also great for lounging out on the couch. you'll never know until you buy one but once you do you'll never give it up!
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy to sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket. It makes you feel so comfortable and secure. It’s really awesome when you get into that deep sleep. I was even thinking of buying another to put on top of my current one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Coletto

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I received this less than a week ago. I have seen improvement in my sleep quality. However, the thread is coming out of the blanket already. I've had my foot and hand get caught in the threads throughout the night. Ultimately it means this 90.00 blanket is not going to last me that long.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Swell!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a weighted blanket before, and I'm glad I bought the 15 lb. as it is HEAVY! Very cozy and comforting, love the color--a beautiful soft green. I'm sure it will be too hot in the summer--I live in South Texas--right now I am using it with the ceiling fan going full on.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Maeve Alison

customer_reviews.title: Calming and Comforting
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so comfortable. I’m a pretty cold sleeper so I sleep with a sheet, comforter, then this on top. I definitely toss and turn less and feel generally more calm and relaxed going to bed (or even just watching tv in bed). Would definitely recommend for anyone, especially those with restless sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn C

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandpa that has a hard time sleeping. And he said that this was amazing! He wanted it for his wife now too because he doesn’t want to share lol but worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Size incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but the 60x80 is actually 58x77. Will not cover a queen bed.
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: really good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: i'm so glad that weighted blankets have become more mainstream and thus more affordable. i remember them being $150+!! i love the way this feels. just to let you know, it's a touch darker than the. photo vs the pastel-ish
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a college student. It came quickly and it’s very attractive. I don’t sleep with it but I laid beneath it to give it a trial run. It’s a hug all over.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my little sister and she has nothing but wonderful things to say about it. She says it's comforting and also not too hot and it makes her feel good and safe!
customer_reviews.author: lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hoping for in a weighted blanket. It is well made for a reasonable price. It makes me feel so happy and cozy every night. It’s even better that it’s in a pretty color unlike the typical gray you see everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is well made. Weight is evenly distributed. Material is high quality. I have used this a couple of nights, and seems to me that I don't find myself waking up to rollover and change postions in bed like I use to.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kostad

customer_reviews.title: String is detaching from blanket after 7 days
customer_reviews.text: The weight is great, but there are multiple places where the string is coming undone. It’s really crazy. Eventually the beads will be at the bottom of the blanket because the string is detaching from the blanket. The blanket is hardly moved as it just lies on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blanket that isn’t too heavy yet comforting. I ended up giving it to my D-I-L as I move around too much and also have arthritis so it wasn’t for me. Lounging around, it would work for me just not sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Kris S.

customer_reviews.title: Feels Like a Bug Hug
customer_reviews.text: Weighted blankets are great for anxiety. I got this hoping it would help me sleep better since nighttime is when I’m more prone to panic attacks. It works really nicely. It feels like I’m being hugged and it’s really comforting.
customer_reviews.author: Makayla Baker

customer_reviews.title: Better sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I so regret the long time I waited to buy it!! Yes, it's an amazing feeling when I am under it. Buying another to leave on my sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Vall

customer_reviews.title: Comforting
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this blanket, she is a college student and after the stress of the day, this is the first thing she grabs.
customer_reviews.author: Laurich

customer_reviews.title: Cotton or polyester???
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this item and the outer packaging says "100% Cotton with glass beads". However, the label on the blanket states "ALL NEW MATERIAL consisting of 100% GLASS BEADS/POLYESTER". Can't write a complete review since I haven't tried it yet and amazon doesn't let me put 0 stars or incomplete. So going with 2 for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Worth a shot
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. I wish I'd gotten heavier. It does settle me down and has slightly improved my sleep. It breathes so it's not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Dia Darling

customer_reviews.title: What a dream!
customer_reviews.text: For years, I have been stacking pillows and blankets on my feet. What a treat to no longer have to sweat things out but still have the same sense of security with this wonderful weighted blanket! The materials used are sustainable and the company is charitable. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: theoceanpeach

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Anniversary Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for our 2 year anniversary. She really wanted a weighted blanket, so I got this for her to use anytime. She said she has slept better the first two nights with it than anytime in the past several years. Didn’t even move. Needless to say she loves it. I actually tried it out briefly and I’m going to invest in one myself. It’s not loud like some other weighted blankets either. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Simple Being Weighted Blanket (Stone Grey, 60x80 15lbs)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly as advertised, perfect color, works like a charm! Looks and feels like a real quality product. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who has Rett Syndrome. Her therapist thought it would be good for her. I tried it first and loved the weighted feeling, so will order one for me, too. She hasn’t tried it yet, but she loves to put a blanket on herself, so I think it will be a hit!
customer_reviews.author: K. Nyberg

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it’s better to spend a little more..
customer_reviews.text: I’d tried another weighted blanket but didn’t catch the brand. I was sold by it. Purchased this one and beads are separated in each sewn square but they bunch up together creating hard balls that constantly need to be separated and flattened to be comfortable. Weighted definitely helps sleep but quality creates a burden unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Alfa Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Is exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Love this weighted blanket!! Good quality and value. Very comfortable. It does calm down jittery nerves, restless legs and mood
customer_reviews.author: lizlvsdolls

product_meta.title: Simple Being Weighted Blanket, 60x80 15lb, Patented 9 Layers Design, Cooling Cotton, Adult Heavy Calming Blanket, Seafoam Green
feature_bullets: TOP QUALITY RAW MATERIAL SELECTIONS: 100% Ultra-fine Cotton top fabrics with a high thread count of 300tc. Non-toxic/ Odourless/ Lead free glass beads.

NEW MANUFACTURING TECHNOLOGY: High SPI (7-8 stitches per Inch) and diamond shape design to encase glass beads, which prevents noise and shifting of beads. Triple stitching on edge of blanket and loops to secure with in duvet.

MAXIMUM COMFORT AND NATURAL SLEEP SUPPORT: Our fabric has a soft COOL feel that will not agitate those with HOT CORE discomfort. Our durable, breathable cotton starts soft and only gets softer over time. The perfect weight stimulates the feeling of being held or hugged. Sleep soundly and wake up with the feeling you have gotten your best nights sleep ever!
EASY TO MAINTAIN - Machine washable on low, gentle cycle with cold water. Do not iron. Tumble dry on low or Hang to dry.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED AND 1 YEAR WARRANTY: If for any reason you are unhappy with your blanket we offer a full refund. Please keep in mind it takes about a week to get use to the blanket weight. Please make sure you follow our sizing chart for correct fit and sizing.
